node.statement: (Regularized RN derivative) For each eps > 0, the Radon-Nikodym derivative R_eps(phi) = d(T_psi* mu_eps)/d(mu_eps)(phi) equals exp(Psi_eps(phi)) where Psi_eps(phi) = -DeltaV_eps(phi) + <(-Delta+m^2)psi, phi> - (1/2)||psi||^2_{H^1} and DeltaV_eps(phi) = V_eps(phi - psi) - V_eps(phi) is the interaction difference.
